## Aris.isBootstrapRequired() method

Check if an instance requires bootstrap

**Signature:**

```typescript
isBootstrapRequired(): Promise<boolean>;
```
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

True if an instance has not been bootstrapped
